16 def ndarray2format(raw_img: numpy.ndarray, format: str='png') -> bytes:
17  '''
18  Converts numpy.ndarray to some binary format (png, jpeg, ...)
19  '''
20  try:
21  fp = io.BytesIO() #create io stream
22  img = Image.fromarray(raw_img) #grab image from ndarray
23  img.save(fp=fp, format=format) #save image in stream
24  fp.seek(0) #move stream cursor to start
25  return fp.read() #return stream content (bytes)
26  except Exception as e:
27  logging.error(str(e))
28  return None
29 
30 
31 def ndarray2str(raw_img: numpy.ndarray, format: str='png') -> str:
32  '''
33  Converts numpy.ndarray to string
34  '''
35  try:
36  bimg = cv2.imencode('.' + format, raw_img)[1].tostring()
37  return base64.b64encode(bimg).decode('utf-8')
38  except Exception as e:
39  logging.error(str(e))
40  return None
41 
42 def str2ndarray(string: str) -> numpy.ndarray:
43  try:
44  b64str = base64.b64decode(string.encode('utf-8'))
45  nparr = numpy.fromstring(b64str, numpy.uint8)
46  image = cv2.imdecode(nparr, cv2.IMREAD_COLOR)
47  return image
48  except Exception as e:
49  logging.error(str(e))
50  return None
51 
52 
53 def raw_audio2wav(raw_audio: bytes, pyaudio_config: dict) -> bytes:
54  '''
55  pyaudio_config has the next format:
56  "pyaudio":{
57  "format": pyaudio.<format>,
58  "channels": int,
59  "rate": int,
60  "frames_per_buffer": int
61  },
62  '''
63  try:
64  samp_size = pyaudio.PyAudio().get_sample_size(pyaudio_config['format'])
65  f = io.BytesIO()
66  wave_writer = wave.Wave_write(f)
67  wave_writer.setnchannels(pyaudio_config['channels'])
68  wave_writer.setsampwidth(samp_size)
69  wave_writer.setframerate(pyaudio_config['rate'])
70  wave_writer.writeframes(raw_audio)
71 
72  f.seek(0)
73  return f.read()
74  except Exception as e:
75  logging.error(str(e))
76  print('convert:', str(e ))
77  return None
